name: "Dream" Job
description:
"Dream" Job -  is a project created by Alex and Kirby for VimJam2. The project tells the Story of Josh, who just graduated from university and came to his first job. How will they meet him there? How will his boss take it? You will find all the answers in our game.

The game was created in 63 hours, 43 minutes and 17 seconds.

Also, the game was created in the conditions of school and work, so not all the planned mechanics were implemented.

Special thanks to Vimlark and 8 Bits to Infinity for hosting this incredible event

Thank you all and have a nice game.
